Summary: It flew over at about 1000 mph, stopped, turned, and flew off
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Parkersburg
There were no other sightings in Parkersburg on or around August 8th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in a lawn chair at about 11:30 pm on tuesday august 8th 2007. I was sitting with my dad, and I looked to the sky. I noticed an object zig zaging across the sky and blinking rapidly. It was disc shaped with 2 stubby wing looking things coming out of the front end. My heart felt like it stopped, and I felt very exited. my dad got up out of the chair saying "oh my god, what is that?". I said "it looks like some kind of alien craft" I grabed a spiral note book and drew a picture of what it looked like as it flew over. It stopped suddenly, and turned in place . It flew back towards us at about 1000 mph and about 800 ft. It made no sound at all. We finnaly lost sight of it behind a tree, and it was gone.
